item.title: U.S. experts call for Pfizer vaccine
item.description: U.S. experts on Thursday called on a panel of U.S. government advisers to decide whether to support the large-scale use of Pfizer’s COVID-19 vaccine to combat the outbreak of nearly 300,000 American corona deaths. Pfizer vaccine for corona prevention The meeting of Food and Drug Administration advisers will present the potential hurdles from the beginning to the end of the largest immunization program in U.S. history. Vaccination activities could begin in a few days, depending on how quickly the FDA signs the panel’s recommendations.
